cards.name: RGM-79 GM
cards.loadout: This model is equipped with: Beam Spray Gun, Beam Saber.
wargear: This model’s Beam Spray Gun can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 Hyper Bazooka ◦ 1 Machine Gun

other.name: Safety in Numbers
other.description: Each time a ranged attack targets this model, and there is an EARTH FEDERATION BATTLELINE WALKER unit within 6" of this model, reduce the AP of the incoming attack by 1.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

cards.name: RGM-79G/Gs GM Command
cards.loadout: This model is equipped with: Beam Gun, Beam Saber.
wargear: This model’s Beam Gun can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 Hyper Bazooka ◦ 1 Machine Gun

other.name: Ace
other.description: Once per phase, you can re-roll one Hit roll, one Wound roll or one saving throw made for this model.

other.name: Safety in Numbers
other.description: Each time a ranged attack targets this model, and there is an EARTH FEDERATION BATTLELINE WALKER unit within 6" of this model, reduce the AP of the incoming attack by 1.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

cards.name: RGM-79[G] GM
cards.loadout: This model is equipped with: Machine Gun, Beam Saber.
wargear: This model’s Machine Gun can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 Beam Rifle ◦ 1 Hyper Bazooka ◦ 1 Missile Launcher

wargear.name: Beam Rifle
wargear.description: When targeting a Vehicle or a Monster, attacks from this weapon score Critical Wounds on a 5+.

other.name: Limited Production
other.description: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a unit Below Half-strength, add 1 to the Hit roll.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

cards.name: RGM-79[G] GM Sniper
cards.loadout: This model is equipped with: Long Beam Rifle, Beam Saber.

wargear.name: Long Beam Rifle
wargear.description: When targeting a Vehicle or a Monster, attacks from this weapon score Critical Wounds on a 5+.

other.name: Sniper Smite
other.description: Each time this model Remains Stationary, until the end of the turn, ranged weapons equipped by this model have the Lethal Hits ability.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

cards.name: RX-79[G] Gundam Ground Type
cards.loadout: This model is equipped with: Machine Gun; Beam Saber.
wargear: This model’s Machine Gun can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 180mm Cannon ◦ 1 Beam Rifle ◦ 1 Hyper Bazooka ◦ 1 Missile Launcher

wargear.name: Beam Rifle
wargear.description: This model scores a Critical Wound on a 5+ when targeting a Vehicle or a Monster.

other.name: Limited Prototype
other.description: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a Monster or Vehicle unit, add 1 to the Hit roll. If that target is Titanic or Towering, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-8 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

cards.name: RX-75 Guntank Mass Production
cards.loadout: This model is equipped with: 1 120mm Low Recoil Cannons; 2 Missile Launchers; 1 Crushing Treads.

other.name: Fire Support
other.description: Each time this model Remains Stationary, until the start of your next Movement phase, ranged weapons equipped this model have the [Ignores Cover] ability.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-8 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

cards.name: Hayato Kobayashi
composition: 1 Hayato Kobayashi in an RX-75 Guntank
cards.loadout: This model is equipped with: 2 120mm Low Recoil Cannons; 2 Missile Launchers; 1 Crushing Treads.

other.name: Tactical Thinking
other.description: Each time this model Remains Stationary, until the start of your next Movement phase, ranged weapons equipped this model have the [Ignores Cover] ability and can ignore the penalty to their Hit rolls when making attacks with Indirect Fire weapons against targets that are not visible to them.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-8 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

other.name: Plot Armor
other.description: This model has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against ranged attacks.

other.name: Terrifynig Visage (Psychic)
other.description: At the start of your Shooting phase, select one enemy unit within 12" of this model. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test.

cards.name: Heinz Baer
